about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate mobile developer with over 5 years of experience specializing in React Native and iOS development. I've led the development of multiple high-impact mobile applications, from concept to App Store deployment. My expertise includes building scalable architectures, implementing complex animations, optimizing app performance, and mentoring junior developers. I'm driven by creating intuitive user experiences and writing clean, maintainable code that stands the test of time.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of mobile applications I've built, showcasing my expertise in React Native, iOS development, and mobile architecture.

items.title: HealthTrack Pro
items.description: A comprehensive health and fitness tracking app built with React Native. Features include real-time biometric monitoring, personalized workout plans, and social sharing capabilities. Integrated with Apple HealthKit and Google Fit APIs.

items.title: EcoDelivery
items.description: A sustainable food delivery platform with real-time tracking, carbon footprint calculation, and eco-friendly restaurant partnerships. Built with React Native and integrated with mapping APIs and payment systems.

items.title: FinFlow
items.description: A personal finance management app with AI-powered spending insights, budget tracking, and investment portfolio management. Features secure biometric authentication and real-time market data integration.

items.title: TaskMaster
items.description: A productivity app with advanced task management, team collaboration, and AI-powered project insights. Features include real-time sync, offline support, and integration with popular productivity tools.
